aka: Serra Pelada: The Legend of the Gold Mountain

writer.name: 毛里西奥·利索夫斯基 Mauricio Lissovski

this_title: Serra Pelada - A Lenda Da Montanha De Ouro
trans_title: Serra Pelada: The Legend of the Gold Mountain
introduction: Serra Pelada's discovery in 1979 precipitated one of the world's largest contemporary gold rushes. In a matter of days miners could make hundreds of thousands of dollars as chunks of gold kilos in weight were found.
chinese_title: Serra Pelada - A Lenda Da Montanha De Ouro
